00033         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00034         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename vecType<T, P>::bool_type lessThan
00035         (
00036                 vecType<T, P> const & x,
00037                 vecType<T, P> const & y
00038         )
00039         {
00040                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<T>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<T>::is_integer,
00041                         "Invalid template instantiation of 'lessThan', GLM vector types required floating-point or integer value types vectors");
00042                 assert(x.length() == y.length());
00043 
00044                 typename vecType<bool, P>::bool_type Result(vecType<bool, P>::_null);
00045                 for(int i = 0; i < x.length(); ++i)
00046                         Result[i] = x[i] < y[i];
00047 
00048                 return Result;
00049         }

00052         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename vecType<T, P>::bool_type lessThanEqual
00053         (
00054                 vecType<T, P> const & x,
00055                 vecType<T, P> const & y
00056         )
00057         {
00058                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<T>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<T>::is_integer,
00059                         "Invalid template instantiation of 'lessThanEqual', GLM vector types required floating-point or integer value types vectors");
00060                 assert(x.length() == y.length());
00061 
00062                 typename vecType<bool, P>::bool_type Result(vecType<bool, P>::_null);
00063                 for(int i = 0; i < x.length(); ++i)
00064                         Result[i] = x[i] <= y[i];
00065                 return Result;
00066         }

00068         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00069         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename vecType<T, P>::bool_type greaterThan
00070         (
00071                 vecType<T, P> const & x,
00072                 vecType<T, P> const & y
00073         )
00074         {
00075                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<T>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<T>::is_integer,
00076                         "Invalid template instantiation of 'greaterThan', GLM vector types required floating-point or integer value types vectors");
00077                 assert(x.length() == y.length());
00078 
00079                 typename vecType<bool, P>::bool_type Result(vecType<bool, P>::_null);
00080                 for(int i = 0; i < x.length(); ++i)
00081                         Result[i] = x[i] > y[i];
00082                 return Result;
00083         }

00085         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00086         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename vecType<T, P>::bool_type greaterThanEqual
00087         (
00088                 vecType<T, P> const & x,
00089                 vecType<T, P> const & y
00090         )
00091         {
00092                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<T>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<T>::is_integer,
00093                         "Invalid template instantiation of 'greaterThanEqual', GLM vector types required floating-point or integer value types vectors");
00094                 assert(x.length() == y.length());
00095 
00096                 typename vecType<bool, P>::bool_type Result(vecType<bool, P>::_null);
00097                 for(int i = 0; i < x.length(); ++i)
00098                         Result[i] = x[i] >= y[i];
00099                 return Result;
00100         }

00102         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00103         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename vecType<T, P>::bool_type equal
00104         (
00105                 vecType<T, P> const & x,
00106                 vecType<T, P> const & y
00107         )
00108         {
00109                 assert(x.length() == y.length());
00110 
00111                 typename vecType<bool, P>::bool_type Result(vecType<bool, P>::_null);
00112                 for(int i = 0; i < x.length(); ++i)
00113                         Result[i] = x[i] == y[i];
00114                 return Result;
00115         }

00117         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00118         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename vecType<T, P>::bool_type notEqual
00119         (
00120                 vecType<T, P> const & x,
00121                 vecType<T, P> const & y
00122         )
00123         {
00124                 assert(x.length() == y.length());
00125 
00126                 typename vecType<bool, P>::bool_type Result(vecType<bool, P>::_null);
00127                 for(int i = 0; i < x.length(); ++i)
00128                         Result[i] = x[i] != y[i];
00129                 return Result;

00132         template <precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00133         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool any(vecType<bool, P> const & v)
00134         {
00135                 bool Result = false;
00136                 for(int i = 0; i < v.length(); ++i)
00137                         Result = Result || v[i];
00138                 return Result;
00139         }

00141         template <precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00142         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool all(vecType<bool, P> const & v)
00143         {
00144                 bool Result = true;
00145                 for(int i = 0; i < v.length(); ++i)
00146                         Result = Result && v[i];
00147                 return Result;
00148         }
00149 
00150         template <precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00151         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER vecType<bool, P> not_(vecType<bool, P> const & v)
00152         {
00153                 typename vecType<bool, P>::bool_type Result(vecType<bool, P>::_null);
00154                 for(int i = 0; i < v.length(); ++i)
00155                         Result[i] = !v[i];
00156                 return Result;
00157         }
